# selectedToolItemIdentifier

**Instance Property**

The identifier of the selected tool item in the tool picker.

## Declaration

```swift
var selectedToolItemIdentifier: String { get set }
```

## Managing selected tools

- **selectedToolItem**: The currently selected tool item in the tool picker.

items.description: The currently selected tool item in the tool picker.
items.name: selectedToolItem
